message_1:
Given the predicate P(x): "x is an even integer," and the domain of discourse is the set of integers, which of the following statements are true?

a) P(3)
b) P(10)
c) P(-6)
d) P(0)
message_2:
a) P(3) is false because 3 is not an even integer.
b) P(10) is true because 10 is an even integer.
c) P(-6) is true because -6 is an even integer.
d) P(0) is true because 0 is an even integer.
